document.full_text: after nato warplanes hit a rebel convoy on thursday, the alliance explained that it had not been forewarned that the rebels were using tanks at the time of the attack.
document.title: nato expresses regret for airstrike
lines_and_colors: after nato warplanes hit a rebel convoy on thursday, the alliance explained that it had not been forewarned that the rebels were using tanks at the time of the attack.
